SEARCH
Package org.example

Class Library

java.lang.Object
org.example.Book
org.example.Library
public class Library extends Book
The Library class represents a library and provides methods for managing books.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Library(String libraryName)
    Constructs a Library object with the specified library name.
